item.title: Pink Android Intercept Means Business
item.description:
The Samsung Intercept, with its stylish satin pink exterior, could easily be described as “Pretty in Pink,” much like the classic 80s movie. This phone is more than just attractive; it’s also a highly capable device. This pink Android phone boasts a large 3-inch touchscreen display, providing access to a vast library of apps from the Android Market. What sets it apart from other touchscreen phones is its full slide-out QWERTY keyboard, enabling swift emailing, instant messaging, and texting...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/pink-android-intercept-means-business/

item.title: Your Ally In The Android vs iPhone Battle
item.description:
LG’s initial Android offering, the LG Ally for Verizon Wireless, is a remarkable device. It boasts a range of features and access to a vast library of apps on the Android Market. If you prioritize texting and email, you’ll appreciate the tactile feedback of real keys. The LG Ally features a 3.2-inch touchscreen and a slide-out QWERTY keyboard with well-sized keys. With five customizable home screens, you can personalize it with numerous Android apps...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/your-ally-in-the-android-vs-iphone-battle/
